description: Defines mandatory control checks (CIDs) for GSEP-C execution stages, mapping them to required verification logic and failure thresholds.

controls.description: Ensure Access Control Verification List (ACVL) is loaded and immutable prior to intent registration.
Pre-check the Master Pipeline Arbitration Mechanism (MPAM) integrity and availability.
Verify the constraint boundary state transition locking mechanism is active.
Trigger and verify the successful computation of the Execution Context Validity Matrix.
Ensure the Transition Efficacy Measurement is within acceptable bounds before finality assessment.
Validation that ECVM, TEMM, and all required Axioms (I, II, III) result in a state that permits atomic commit.
Confirm irreversible persistence of all generated artifacts and required audit records (ADTM, MPAM, STR).
